          <title>
            <string language="ca">El Drac</string>
            <string language="en">The dragon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Drache</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le dragon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O dragon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il drago</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο δράκος</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Joc de destresa, per fer anar el ratolí, sobre el tema del cavaller, el drac i la princesa.</string>
            <string language="en">A game of skill at handling the mouse on the theme of the knight, the dragon and the princess.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">atenció</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>
            <string language="es">atención</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="ca">orientació</string>
            <string language="en">gear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">percepció</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">habilitat</string>
            <string language="en">skill</string>
            <string language="es">habilidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Spiel der Fähigkeit am Handhaben der Maus auf
dem Thema des Ritters, des Drachen und der Prinzessin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu d'adresse à manipuler la souris sur le 
thème du chevalier, du dragon et de la princesse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um jogo de habilidade em segurar o rato no tema do
knight, do dragon e da princesa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un gioco di abilità a maneggiare il mouse sul 
tema del cavaliere, del drago e della principessa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παιχνίδι της ικανότητας στο χειρισμό του 
ποντικιού στο θέμα του ιππότη, του δράκου και της πριγκήπισσας.</string>
          </description>
